name: Border Immersion
description: BYTE immersion trips are a great way for youth and adults to learn about the US/Mexico border through a lens of sport, public health, and Positive Youth Engagement. Each 3-5 day trip is customized for a visiting group, tailored for the ages and interests of participants. All trips include an introduction to US/Mexico geopolitics, volunteer visits to BYTE program sites on both sides of the border, and opportunities to meet and learn from professionals operating in the border humanitarian sector.
